testcase.brief: Split DNS mode, set three internal DNS server, if first and second internal DNS servers stop, will use the third DNS server
testcase.description: Topology to use Description Split DNS mode, set three internal DNS server, if first and second internal DNS servers stop, will use the third DNS server Pre-condition Set interface eth0 to wan mode Set interface eth1 to access mode and enable mac-learning Eth0 can obtain ip address from DHCP server Disable dhcp client on mgt0 and configure a static ip address Enable DHCP server on interface mgt0.1 Enable DNS server on mgt0.1 Set a SSID and bind it to interface wifi0 Connect a client to SSID and make client obtain ip address from mgt0.1 Set internal DNS server dns1 and dns2 and dns3( dns1and dns2 are not reachable or dns service be stoped) Only set one external DNS server dns1 Set internal domain name test.com Set filter _ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional Open debug _kdebug fe basic/detail and debug console Use Wireshark to capture packet on client and DNS server Test procedure 1. Ping xxx.test.com on client, verify which DNS server be used 2. Ping xxx.yyy.com on client, verify which DNS server be used Expect result 1. First internal dns1 and dns2 be tried and failed, then use dns3 2. External DNS server dns1 should be used

step.desc: Set eth1 to access mode and enable mac-learning
step.telnet: -v "user-profile lan1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute 1" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} mac-learning enable"

step.desc: Enable DHCP server on interface mgt0.1 Enable DNS server on mgt0.1, Set DNS mode to nonsplit of mgt0.1
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0.1 dns-server ext-resolve dns1 ${pub.dns2.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dns-server int-domain-name ${cvg1.dns1.domain1}" -v "int m0.1 dns-server int-resolve dns1 ${pub.invalid_dns1.ip}" -v "int m0.1 dns-server int-resolve dns2 ${pub.invalid_dns2.ip}" -v "int m0.1 dns-server int-resolve dns3 ${cvg1.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dns-server enable" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int3} shutdown"

step.desc: br1.vpc1 get ip addr from dhcp server of mgt0.1
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
Set filter _ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional,Open debug _kdebug fe basic/detail and debug console
step.telnet: -v "_debug dns" -v "_ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail"
